text: Liberal Animation is the debut studio album by American punk rock band, NOFX. It was self-released in 1988 and was later re-released in 1991 under their record label, Epitaph. The producers of the album were Brett Gurewitz and NOFX. The title of the album is a play on the phrase "animal liberation". ==Songs== ==References== Category:1988 albums Category:NOFX albums Category:Punk albums
title: Liberal Animation
